subsection_content:
Prediabetes often has no symptoms. In some people, prediabetes manifests itself through the following signs:
The skin on some parts of the body such as the neck, armpits, and groin is dark; Drink lots of water, urinate many times a day.; Faded or limited vision; The body is often tired and has difficulty concentrating, but the cause is unknown.
Signs of pre-diabetes are often easily confused with other health conditions, so people should have regular health checks to screen and detect the disease early, thereby adjusting their lifestyle. Eat, drink and exercise appropriately.

tien tieu duong.json. Signs of prediabetes
Prediabetes often has no symptoms. In some people, prediabetes manifests itself through the following signs:
The skin on some parts of the body such as the neck, armpits, and groin is dark; Drink lots of water, urinate many times a day.; Faded or limited vision; The body is often tired and has difficulty concentrating, but the cause is unknown.
Signs of pre-diabetes are often easily confused with other health conditions, so people should have regular health checks to screen and detect the disease early, thereby adjusting their lifestyle. Eat, drink and exercise appropriately.
